Description: Coin-weight: dīnār. Eight line Kufic inscription within a beaded border. Made of green glass.
Curator's comments: From the same die: Balog, P. 1976. ‘Ummayad, ʿAbbasid and Ṭūlūnid glass weights and vessel-stamps’. New York, 129; Cf. Rogers, E.T. 1878. Unpublished glass weights and measures. ‘Journal of the Royal Asiatic Society’, 14; Balog 1976, 127-8.

A second dīnār-weight die is represented by Fahmi 1957, 42 and a third one, crudely written, by Grohmann 1925, 5 and Launois 1960 vol. I, 8. Bibliography: Fahmi, A. 1957. ‘Sinaj al-sikka fī fajr al-Islām’. Cairo; Grohmann, Adolf. 1925. Arabische Eichungstempel, Glasgewichte und Amulette aus Wiener Sammlungen. ‘Islamica’ I. London; Launois, Aimée. 1960. ‘Catalogue des étalons monétaires et autres pièces musulmans de la collection Jean Maspéro’ vol. 1. Paris.
Bibliographic references: Morton 1985 / A Catalogue of Early Islamic Glass Stamps (130)
Associated names: Named in inscription: Ḥafṣ b. al-Walīd
Named in inscription: Yazīd b. Abī Yazīd
